A Warm Welcome

1 in 4 of us will experience a common mental health problem in a given year. Modern life has affected us all in different ways, it has made all of us more susceptible to anxiety, depression and other common emotional problems. We can become stressed as employees, students or graduates, despite living in an age where social media is now one of lifeâ€™s essentials, we struggle to cope with social isolation and feeling connected with others. It allows us to compare ourselves with others, leaving us scrutinising ourselves, leaving many of us feeling inadequate and unattractive. Physical health problems can leave us feeling hopeless and helpless.

KA-Therapy offers Cognitive Behavioural Psychotherapy, an evidence-based psychotherapy to help you improve your psychological wellbeing. Therapies are delivered in a quiet, private and comfortable environment, providing a safe therapeutic space to explore your difficulties.

Contact Me
); } } export default About;
